---
name: "DBC Research Runbook: Conduct pilot session"
about: To guide the running of a pilot session for a study. 
labels: "disability-benenfits,research" 
assignees: ''

---

### Description
This ticket covers running a pilot session for the [study name] study. The study focuses on [brief description of study]. Schedule as many pilots as necessary for the number of moderators. 

#### Timeframe for this ticket
This ticket should take well under a single sprint.

#### Output
N/A

### Tasks
- [ ] Recruit pilot participant(s) from your company or another one
   - Ideally, recruit someone who isn’t familiar what you’re working on
   - You can use [this list of volunteers](https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/va.gov-team-sensitive/blob/master/Administrative/vagov-users/team-veterans.md) to find people within OCTO who are veterans that want to help
- [ ] Schedule pilot(s)
- [ ] Slack your Perigean lead with the date, time, and participant for your pilot(s)
- [ ] Schedule team debrief sessions after each pilot
- [ ] Run pilot(s) (include enabling partner and crew UX lead as optional)
- [ ] Debrief pilot(s) with team
- [ ] Make any revisions needed to conversation guide and prototype
- [ ] Send thank you slack message to pilot participant(s) if appropriate

### Acceptance criteria
- [ ] Pilot sessions have been conducted

### Resources
- [List of related files/ReadMe]
